Learn about the Survey Web package for b: Learn about the Survey Web package for building survey and questionnaire UI components.
Frontend component library for survey te: Frontend component library for survey template management and form rendering in MBC CQRS Serverless applications.
The Survey Web package (`@mbc-cqrs-serve: The Survey Web package (`@mbc-cqrs-serverless/survey-web`) provides React components for creating, editing, and rendering survey templates. It supports multiple question types, drag-and-drop section reordering, and real-time collaboration through AWS AppSync.
Create, edit, and delete survey template: Create, edit, and delete survey templates
9 built-in question types for various da: 9 built-in question types for various data collection needs
AWS AppSync integration for collaborativ: AWS AppSync integration for collaborative editing
Displays a list of survey templates with: Displays a list of survey templates with search and management capabilities.
Editor for creating and modifying survey: Editor for creating and modifying survey templates with drag-and-drop functionality.
Renders a survey template as a fillable: Renders a survey template as a fillable form for respondents.
The Survey Web package supports 9 questi: The Survey Web package supports 9 question types:
Single-line text input for brief respons: Single-line text input for brief responses.
Multi-line text area for detailed respon: Multi-line text area for detailed responses.
Radio button selection for mutually excl: Radio button selection for mutually exclusive options.
Select dropdown for choosing from a list: Select dropdown for choosing from a list.
Configurable star/heart/thumb rating inp: Configurable star/heart/thumb rating input with 2-10 levels.
Date picker for date selection with conf: Date picker for date selection with configurable options.
Time picker for time or duration input.
Include time selection along with date: Include time selection along with date
Input mode: specific time or duration: Input mode: specific time or duration
Fetch and manage survey templates with p: Fetch and manage survey templates with pagination and search support.
Hook for editing survey templates with s: Hook for editing survey templates with schema management and submission handling.
Function to retry fetching survey data: Function to retry fetching survey data
Boolean indicating if schema has changes: Boolean indicating if schema has changes
Boolean for submit button disabled state: Boolean for submit button disabled state
Hook for deleting survey templates with: Hook for deleting survey templates with success callback.
Navigate back to list or refresh: Navigate back to list or refresh

Section header item - acts as a bookmark: Section header item - acts as a bookmark or page break
ID of another section-header for conditi: ID of another section-header for conditional branching

Key dependencies used by this package:: Key dependencies used by this package:
This component uses `useParams()` from `: This component uses `useParams()` from `next/navigation` internally to get the survey ID from the URL. For new surveys (create mode), render on a route without an ID parameter. For editing existing surveys, render on a route with an ID parameter (e.g., `/surveys/[id]/edit`).
Route: /surveys/[id]/edit (edit mode - I: Route: /surveys/[id]/edit (edit mode - ID extracted from URL via useParams)
The hooks documented below (`useSurveyTe: The hooks documented below (`useSurveyTemplates`, `useEditSurveyTemplate`, `useDeleteSurveyTemplate`) are internal hooks used by the page components. They are NOT exported from the main package index and cannot be imported directly. The import paths shown are for illustration purposes only. Use the page components (`SurveyTemplatePage`, `EditSurveyTemplatePage`) instead for standard use cases.
